forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 2am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2am and 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 71. South wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
